params._owner: Address to retrieve a mirrored NFT for.

returns._0: Mirrored NFT for the given address.

getMirroredNFT(address).notice: Retrieves the mirrored NFT for a given address.

userdoc.notice: MagicMirrorManager is a contract meant to be deployed on the network where the NFTs to         be mirrored currently exist. Users can select one NFT to act as the mirrored NFT and can         update this NFT by sending a transaction to the MagicMirrorManager.
